column4: if I want to install ubuntu 7.10 in a disk with 30gbs unpartitioned space and 180gb of partitions with data, how do I do that?
I mean, do I have to take any special cautions to make sure I do not delete the data on the other partitions?
during the partitioning you set create the 30gbs partition allocated to / and 180gb to /home
just dont explicitely delete any of ther partitions
